text.more:
The nodes show people, places (mostly cities) and countries. 
These node types are grouped by color.
The edges show the relations between people and a place
and secondly, relations from places to countries.
The color represents a specific kind of relation, in this case place of birth, place of death, place of employment, place of living.
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata. 
The graph shows people (first node type) who have corresponded with Guido Gezelle and with who Guido Gezelle has corresponded.
Next it also shows the place of birth, place of employment, place of death and place of living of these people. (second node type)
These places are in turn connected to their respective countries (third node type)
text.title: Geographical network of the correspondents of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata

legend.edgeLabel: place of birth, death, employment, living
